variable.name: DATE_APPROX
variable.comment: NOTE: IF DAY PART OF PROCDATE WAS MISSING THEN DAY WAS SET TO "15", IF MONTH PART OF PROCDATE WAS MISSING THEN MONTH WAS SET TO "7".

variable.name: LINE
variable.description: RECORD UNIQUE IDENTIFIER (LINE NUMBER OF PRINTOUT FOR CHART REVIEW)
variable.comment: NOTE: This is 'multiple records per id' dataset. Some of 543 ids have more than one record. LINE is a unique identifier for each record.

variable.name: MISSDAY
variable.description: DAY PART OF PROC DATE IS NOT AVAILABLE (DATE_APPROX = 1)

variable.name: MISSMONTH
variable.description: MONTH PART PROCDATE IS NOT AVAILABLE (DATE_APPROX = 1)

variable.name: MISSYEAR
variable.description: YEAR PART OF PROCDATE IS NOT AVAILABLE (DATE_APPROX = 1)

variable.name: PROCDATE
variable.description: PROCEDURE DATE, NUMBER OF DAYS SINCE EXAM 1
variable.comment: NOTE: SEE NOTES UNDER PROC_DAY, PROC_MONTH, PROC_YEAR AND MISSDAY MISSMONTH MISSYEAR.

variable.name: SURGTYPE
variable.value: VALVE PROCEDURE: VALVE REPLACEMENT WITH MECHANICAL PROSTHESIS
VALVE PROCEDURE: SURGICAL REPAIR, NOT COMMISSUROTOMY (VALVULOPLASTY RINGS FALL INTO THIS CATEGORY)
VALVE PROCEDURE: UNKNOWN TYPE OF PROCEDURE
